backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining product, user, and site-content types with maps and admin-gated mutating methods using access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module that returns the previous actor unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for build or documentation reference.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining WhatsApp number configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Runbook documenting steps to retry deployment with diagnostic output.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with client-side routing via pathname parsing and setup for React Query and theming.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthD: Displays parsed admin auth errors with collapsible technical details and a copy-to-clipboard option.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout handling Internet Identity login, backend readiness checks, admin verification, and recovery actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with navigation links, social icons, and branding, calling onNavigate for internal navigation.
frontend/src/components/GuestMergePrompt: Displays a dialog prompting users to merge guest cart or wishlist items into their account.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main site header with navigation, search, theme toggle, and mobile menu, using guest cart and wishlist counts.
frontend/src/components/home/ContactCtaS: Renders a contact call‑to‑action section with contact info and a button that navigates to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/home/CustomerRev: Shows a grid of static customer reviews with star ratings and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageBan: Carousel component for homepage banners with autoplay, navigation arrows, and optional CTA actions.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepagePro: Displays a product grid with optional filter navigation and a section title.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageSec: Renders dynamic content sections with optional images and an about-page CTA.
frontend/src/components/home/OffersSecti: Displays promotional offer banners with images, text, and navigation to filtered catalog views.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Static partners showcase section with a header and a logos strip image.
frontend/src/components/Logo.tsx: Simple logo component rendering a circular image at configurable sizes.
frontend/src/components/MediaSlotUploade: Provides an image upload slot with preview, replace, and remove actions using ExternalBlob uploads.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Shows a product card with hover image swap, wishlist and cart actions, and navigation to the product page.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: A simple rich text editor with toolbar formatting buttons and contentEditable support.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorBoun: React error boundary component showing detailed error info with options to copy, export logs, and reload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Provides a helper that checks backend admin status before allowing protected operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages local admin session state with login, logout, and session validation using backend admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendReadiness.t: Checks if the backend is reachable and ready by calling actor.isReady with retry and polling behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestCart.ts: Stores and updates a guest user’s cart in local storage with add, remove, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestWishlist.ts: Maintains a guest wishlist in local storage with add, remove, and clear operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for managing Internet Identity login, logout, and stored identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines product, admin, and cart-related queries and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Fetches and updates site content, enforcing admin checks on mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeMode.ts: Controls site theme based on user override or admin-configured default and applies it to the document.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom color variables, dark mode styles, and utility classes for a premium gold-themed UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with brand mission, images, and value cards highlighting product quality and pilgrim-focused features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Provides an admin view listing product categories with search, sorting, and statistics derived from all products.
Admin dashboard showing product, category, lookbook stats and quick actions using data fetched from queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLookbook.t: Admin interface for managing lookbook images with search, sorting, add/edit dialogs, uploads, and product tagging.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProducts.t: Admin interface for listing, filtering, sorting, creating, updating, and deleting products with image upload and form management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessions.t: Displays read‑only information about guest sessions and how cart and wishlist data are stored locally.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for editing hero text, contact details, and toggling dark mode using site content API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Implements the shopping cart page with guest cart handling, product details, subtotal calculation, and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Displays the checkout summary and generates a WhatsApp checkout link using cart details and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Builds the contact page with store info, dynamic site content, and a user message form.
frontend/src/pages/Diagnostics.tsx: Developer diagnostics page showing backend readiness, actor status, and runtime logs with export and clearing tools.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage displaying banners, category cards, and curated product sections like best sellers and new arrivals.
frontend/src/pages/Lookbook.tsx: Lookbook page showing styled images with tagged products and a detail dialog for viewing image information.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Product catalog with filtering, sorting, and category/product‑type selectors, displaying filtered product cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page showing product info, gallery, size/color selection, and actions for cart and wishlist.
frontend/src/pages/Returns.tsx: Renders the returns and exchanges info page with policies, steps, and support details using styled cards and prose sections.
frontend/src/pages/Shipping.tsx: Displays shipping information including delivery times, packaging, processing, tracking, and policy details.
frontend/src/pages/Wishlist.tsx: Shows the user's wishlist, allowing navigation, removal, clearing, and adding items to cart using product and wishlist hooks.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Parses backend or network errors into categorized admin auth error messages with suggested next steps.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session persistence in localStorage, including reading, saving, clearing, and resetting sessions.
frontend/src/utils/bannerDestination.ts: Encodes, decodes, and handles navigation behavior for banner destination metadata such as catalog, product, or external links.
frontend/src/utils/bannerEncoding.ts: Encodes and decodes banner text objects to and from JSON for storage or rendering.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Provides INR currency formatting helpers for prices with and without the currency symbol.
frontend/src/utils/devLogBuffer.ts: Captures console logs and errors into an in‑memory buffer with export and download utilities for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/localCart.ts: Handles reading, saving, versioning, and clearing the guest shopping cart from localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/localWishlist.ts: Manages a versioned guest wishlist in localStorage with get, save, and clear helpers.
Provides product image URLs with fallbacks and builds primary/secondary images or thumbnails.
frontend/src/utils/siteContentDefaults.t: Returns default site content including hero text, sections, contact info, footer links, and dark-mode flag.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontNav.ts: Defines storefront navigation structure and homepage category cards with associated catalog filters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash params.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp checkout URL with formatted order details and normalizes the target phone number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, shadows, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, known issues, and feature requests focused on fixing admin login and role bootstrapping.
